title: Marvel's Ultimate Universe in reading order
description:
Welcome to the Ultimates universe, AKA Earth 1610 - Sexytime Earth.

This is a rebooted Marvel Universe, combining the impetus of Heroes Reborn with the widescreen spectacle of The Authority.

Comics for the modern age where one could escape addiction, tabloid exploits and individual excess to read about addiction, tabloid exploits and individual excess.

I'm not kidding. These stories did not make me feel better about the world.

In a bold, yet completely unintentional move, there is a dearth of Spider-Man material. Just pretend on Earth 1610, real life people are awesome (the United States is lead by President Mister Rogers).

Such a world would consider the Ultimates comics fiction, because they can't imagine a place where everyone treats one another so shabbily. 

Now imagine this world where the I.P. for the Ultimates resides with the Fox Comics Group, who in a licensing tiff with 21st Century Marvel, completely yanks Spider-Man from the publication schedule. An eerie mirror version of events where the Fantastic Four and X-Men are being erased from our own published universe.

Or one can just as easily imagine I just don't collect Ultimate Spider-Anything.



This torrent is a repack of digital files from several different sources. The folder structure reflects the reading order found here:
 <a href="
http://community.comicbookresources.com/showthread.php?659-Ultimate-Marvel&p=35710&viewfull=1#post35710" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://community.comicbookresources.com/showthread.php?659-Ultimate-Marvel&p=35710&viewfull=1#post35710</a>

This page has been included in the torrent itself for your reference, should you decide to add newer digital files. Or Ultimate Spider-Man stuff
